Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.Board

Class Strongbox

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.observer.StrongboxObservable
it.polimi.ingsw.model.Board.Strongbox
All Implemented Interfaces:
ResourceSpot
public class Strongbox
extends StrongboxObservable
implements ResourceSpot
This class is used to represent the Strongbox used to store the resources generated by ProductionPowers
